biotools.summary: FoldMiner aligns a user-supplied or identified query structure to a database of single domain targets to discover structural neighbours and characteristic motifs.  Query structures can also be aligned to one or more user-specified structures using the LOCK 2 algorithm.

bioschemas.name: FoldMiner and LOCK 2
bioschemas.summary: FoldMiner aligns a user-supplied or identified query structure to a database of single domain targets to discover structural neighbours and characteristic motifs.  Query structures can also be aligned to one or more user-specified structures using the LOCK 2 algorithm.
